mapper.sql: t.app_id as id, t.name as name, t.description as `desc`, t.create_time as createTime, t.update_time as updateTime, t.emails as emails
mapper.select: SELECT ,u.user_id as belongUserIds,u.name as belongUserNames FROM app t LEFT JOIN ( SELECT ua.app_id, GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT u.user_id) as user_id, GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT u.name) as name FROM user_app ua,USER u WHERE ua.user_id = u.user_id GROUP BY ua.app_id ) u on t.app_id = u.app_id
